title: Experienced C# Dotnet Developer needed
description: We are a building a coaching and booking app and seeking a motivated and detail-oriented .NET developer to join our dynamic team. You will contribute to the enhancement and maintenance of our cutting-edge coaching software. Responsibilities: - Collaborate with senior developers to design, develop, test, and maintain .NET applications using C#. - Write Unit Tests ensuring code meets requirements and passes all edge cases. - Create/Update API endpoints ensuring it meets requirements. - Utilise MongoDB for writing queries to our database. Work within Agile development methodologies, participating in sprint planning, reviews, and retrospectives. - Communicate effectively within the team and across departments to ensure project requirements are met. - Assist in the integration of additional functionalities and modules into the existing software infrastructure. - Troubleshoot and debug software to ensure optimal performance and user experience. Requirements: - Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field or +5 years experience. - +3 years of practical experience in .NET development using C#. - Experience working with .NET 6 LTS or higher. - JIRA, Postman - Strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles and design patterns (SOLID, DDD). - Proficiency with CQRS with MediatR or equivalent. - Unit Testing (NUnit, XUnit or equivalent). - Experience in developing .NET API endpoints following industry best practices. - Experience using MongoDB or strong understanding of NoSQL designs. - Experience in Agile development methodologies. - Excellent communication and collaboration skills within a team environment. Bonus Skills: - MongoDB Realm App Services. - CLEAN architecture. - Microservices architecture (RabbitMQ, Kafka, etc.) Benefits: - Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies in the sports technology industry. - Collaborative and supportive work environment fostering professional growth. - Competitive compensation package. Can you work 9am-5pm New Zealand timezone? Please only apply if you can work at this time zone.
